website_summaries.verdict: 100% pure Moroccan oil with anti-aging benefits. Best applied in 1 or 2 drops, this powerful oil can also be used on the face and body.
pros: An all-natural choice for those who don’t want any chemicals in their hair routine
Can be used as a conditioning mask or frizz treatment on damp and dry hair
cons: Some users complain that the earthy scent is not perfumed enough for their liking
Due to the unrefined nature, some complain about sediment found at the bottom of the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Its not argan oil. Im from middle east and ...
customer_reviews.text: Its not argan oil. Im from middle east and i know these oils. Its oil from some other seed but if youre specifically looking for argan oil, its nit the one
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Caused horrible breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to break out really really bad! I used it on my skin first as a moisturizer and got horrible acne breakouts within 1 day. I also tried it in my hair after a shower and it caused breakouts all along my hair line and neck. I tried it several times with breaks in between just to make sure that's what was causing it and sure enough, I broke out every single time. I would probably say if you have extremely dry hair and skin that is not acne prone, it may work for you but for me, it was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Brookshire

customer_reviews.title: Yeh me too. Can't get past the bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: It does feel nice. However I'm a customer of Josie Marian's Argon facial products and was trying Aria Starr to save money and I'm going back to Josie Maran. The smell of Aria Starr's oil is enough for me not to enjoy it on my face. It's a funky compost type smell. Josie Maran's 100% Argan oil product is fragrance free and a bit more emollient and longer lasting when i did a comparison. However it really did come down to the smell. changes the whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boekenoogen

customer_reviews.title: Too oily for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I use argan oil for my damaged hair (not pure argan oil, it's mixed with several other ingredients). When I ran out I decided to try a new product that was pure argan oil and purchased Aria Starr Beauty's argan oil. It seems to be a good product for a good price. However, pure argan oil is a little too oily for my hair. The other product I used in the past wasn't as heavy. For that reason I will go back to the original product I used. However, there is nothing wrong with Aria Starr's oil so I'll give it 5 stars because it seems like it is what they claim it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ember BlueTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it for my skin so can only speak to that. I love this oil. I used to use coconut oil for my skin but my cosmetologist asked me to use Aegean oil instead and I turned to amazon and went with this one. I am in love with this oil. Leaves my skin feeling so hydrated and well-loved! I apply a little bit every night as part of my bed time routine. I have two little kids so don’t have time for fancy and long wound skin care regimens. This takes care of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnon

customer_reviews.title: Great for long long hair needs
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with hair and skin results after only 3 days use. My hair is below waist long, tending to the ends and preventing dryness and damage is a constant chore. Your oil has greatly improved my hair in 3 days. My skin looks better too..i love the sun...using this oil (per your suggestion), has helped soften my skin, after full day of sunshine."
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This ARGAN OIL is the BEST!! I noticed a difference within minutes of the 1st application!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wait to apply to my damaged hair, especially after reading the MANY reviews. I noticed a difference within minutes of the 1st application!! Thank goodness, I can actually see light at the end of this tunnel regarding the restoration of my hair after some outer layers got really damaged from a highlighting chemical left in my hair too long by my hair dresser. She was too busy talking to a friend who dropped by! Thank you ARIA STARR for making the product affordable!!
customer_reviews.author: frmhishrt

customer_reviews.title: Best Argan Oil!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this for skin rather than hair. I have tried sooo many different argan oils, as usually I would just buy whatever brand at TJ Maxx or Marshalls. They always smelled horrible, and would sit on my skin rather than be absorbed. This oil has very low smell (trust me, most argan oils smell like fertilizer!) and it is absorbed so nicely. I use this after my serums and before moisturizer. It is such an affordable way to maintain a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used many hair products over the years, nothing of which was as good as this one. it's very effective and sufficient, almost has no smell to it most importantly, it does not make the hair looks oily and greasy, it makes it look natural TBH, I was a little bit surprised by the product's size, it so much smaller than how it looks in the picture. it is almost the size of my finger there is not any complains about the packaging and delivering, it arrived on time in a regular package
customer_reviews.author: abdulmalik

customer_reviews.title: Good formula but smells musky and spoiled. Previously I’ve had a good experience though
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product in the past and have had a good experience; it works well to soothe my dry hair in the winter. However, the product that I received this time has a strong musky smell, almost smelling spoiled. Giving 2 stars because the formula is good, I think I just got a bad bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this because my hair was so dry that it was falling out. I had heard abut the positive attributes of Argan oil in the past, and thrught I would give this a try. Thus far, I am quie pleased. My hair is not as dry, and also not falling out, as in the past. Also, I have put it on my ha nds. I am pleased about how it has worked for them, also. Finally, I am glad that I can use a little, and that works quite effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Spivey-Nieves

customer_reviews.title: worked for me as facial oil pre-cleanse
customer_reviews.text: No scent! Great there. I used this as the oil wash before cleansing and unlike some other oils I tried, this doesn't feel like it's clogging cores, it feels good, effective makeup remover and wipes off nicely. In my experience I've learned not to buy skincare from random companies (I prefer places like The Ordinary now) but this really held up for me strictly as an effective face oil
customer_reviews.author: AllNotesBend

customer_reviews.title: Repurchased
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and use this before I put make up on and before I go to bed. It's not sticky, I guess depending on how much someone puts on. I use very little. There is not a scent, which I love. I've used argon oil that has a strong smell and threw it out because the smell would linger around.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my hair. I have very thick natural curly hair that is difficult to manage. For years I resorted to just pulling it back in a pony tail. Now, when I add just a small amount of this Argan Oil, I can flat iron my hair straight and the humidity does not make my hair go curly! I LOVE IT! Wish I had discovered this YEARS AGO!!!! I will DEFINATELY BUY IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love Nature

customer_reviews.title: The hype is not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I should have done a skin test. Alas, I did not, and my skin was not a happy camper. It looked red and raised. Thankfully, Amazon quickly refunded me for my troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Adonya

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my dry damaged hair
customer_reviews.text: I had bad dry damaged hair from medication and alcohol products. It got so bad that it made it hard for the person who cuts my hair complained that its hard to cut to style (in so many words). I watched a YouTube video about taming frizzy hair where they mentioned this Argan oil so I ordered and followed directions. I've tried other leave in conditioners that just made my hair poofier (for a guy, that's a bad thing) but not this Argan oil. It tamed the frizzies and relaxed my hair. It really does work and I had to give it a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Back for a second purchase - good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm here to buy my second bottle of this stuff. 1 oz has lasted me over a year, so it's a really good value! I add one drop to whatever hair product I am using on my wet hair and it definitely makes my very fine, dry hair look more soft and smooth. Edited to add: I recently started using this on my face due to extremely dry skin related to accutane. It's honestly been a miracle cure. I was using three different types of moisturizer twice a day and still having dry flakey skin. The argan oil lasts all day and my skin is back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY product and reasonably priced!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this product so far! Not only is it easily absorbed into my skin, it is easy to apply. The bottle has a durable eyedropper, which allows you to use just the right amount.The oil itself spreads easily so I'm only using 3 drops and it easily covers my face. I have had no "breakouts", and that's surprising since this is an oil. My skin is definitely smoother and I'm definitely impressed with the quality of this product!!
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH AS SILK
customer_reviews.text: Love this smooth as silk beautiful oil. It feels like a magical elixir, is not a bit greasy, dries quickly and leaves my skin soft and glowing! My skin is very sensitive, particularly on my face, so this essential oil is the answer for me as I cannot tolerate moisturizers. I am now a fan of argan oil-just wish I had found it sooner in my life as it is the answer to dry skin. I hope you try it- you will love it too! Great service from this company too!
customer_reviews.author: mystic9

customer_reviews.title: Not labeled USDA organic
customer_reviews.text: For those concerned about the USDA Certfied Organic, this product does not have the seal of approval. I care about that seal of approval So I'm immediately bummed and can't give this product a high review. I went out of my box and bought this instead of Acure organic argon oil which is certified Organic and actually smells good. I'll give this product a try but if it's advertised organic, I want it to be organic. Will update post soon!
customer_reviews.author: Nila Grier

customer_reviews.title: I haven't always treated my hair the best, generally in the form of overwashing and using ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't always treated my hair the best, generally in the form of overwashing and using multiple products in an attempt to make it soft (but it always ended up greasy). But after doing some research I decided to start weaning myself off of a "normal" haircare routine, wash it less, stop using conditioner and switch to an argan oil instead. My hair has never looked better! It's soft, shiny but not greasy, and feels really healthy and clean between washings (generally 3-4 days). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: bombsfadeaway

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product, however I would recommend the Pura D'or pure Argan oil instead; it's exactly the same quality although you get roughly twice as much for only $4 more. The four ounces weight for this product refers to the full bottle weight, not the weight of the liquid however the Pura D'or weight is four fluid ounces which of course only refers to the liquid amount.
customer_reviews.author: R. McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil for its versatility and pureness. I use it on my skin, scalp and cuticles. I can even use it on my face and not have it break out but keep in mind a little goes a long way. I bought this 1 oz bottle so I can take it with me when I travel. The dropper is really handy too. I never had any problems with the purchase or the product but I like how the seller follows up to make sure you're happy and even provides tips on how to use it. I definitely recommend this oil. By the way, I wasn't compensated in any way for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Austin

customer_reviews.title: She's pretty happy about that as nothing else has worked
customer_reviews.text: This is our first purchase and my wife has used it just once so far. As an additional note, we have very hard water (over 100 grains) and it makes for some difficult issues in many ways, including shampooing hair. In any case, she used it after her shampoo and it seems to work...hair more controllable and no "frizzies". She's pretty happy about that as nothing else has worked.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: This product has terrible smell. I am surprised that so many people have positive experience with this product. I am using Argan Oil for my hair and couldn't tolerate this terrible smell. It looks like this oil got rancid - oils go bad if they are exposed to heat or light. Unfortunate, I have to go through hassle returning it and looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my hair and on my skins
customer_reviews.text: doesn't clog pores, doesn't feel greesy. I use one drop on my skin (dry-combo)usually at night, and three on my hair after washing it. Feels good and absorbs fast. I go through about one bottle every 6 month. I don't use this everyday, but on days when I need the moisture and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Yingge Li

customer_reviews.title: SMELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly was really excited to use this product but it was after I opened it; it had a strong sour smell which made me want to puke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I don't this is real argan oil, smells rancid and did nothing for my hair, even after I mixed it with my conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Onyi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I've always dealt with dry skin, fine lines, and breakouts (I'm only 23). My skin is extremely sensitive, so I'm careful about what I put on my skin. I was looking for an oil to use on my skin that wouldn't clog my pores, but that I could use at night to have moisturized skin when I wake up. Let me tell you, Argan Oil is GREAT for this! I can use it on my hair, my skin, my under eye bags, and on my arms or legs for dry skin. if you're looking for an oil that is good for sensitive skin and absorbs well and doesn't feel greasy, BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Rose P.

customer_reviews.title: and in the winter time it's even worse. I mix in about 5 drops of this ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed my skin. I have really dry skin, and in the winter time it's even worse. I mix in about 5 drops of this argan oil with my everyday moisturizer and it makes my skin super hydrated and smooth. I use it both morning and night after cleansing my face and I definitely think it has made the overall texture and complexion of my skin 10 times better than it was before I started using it. It does have a very very faint smell, but I hardly notice it, and once applied to the face, I can't even smell it anymore. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylour Hill

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good argon oil.
customer_reviews.text: It seems ok. It seems to absorb into the skin fast,has almost no odor. I can't compare it to any other argon oil as this was m first time. I'm using it for my hair that is falling out as part as several things, so I cannot say if it helps wth that, but seems to help my dry scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: If you use the dropper lid...MAKE SURE YOU CLOSE IT UP
customer_reviews.text: I received it and am happy with the product. I haven't used it long enough to give a full review (hence the 4 stars) but the product is as described and seems legit. Worth noting: I'm usually pretty careful with beauty products, but I used the dropper to apply a few drops to my fingers to apply to my face, and I set the dropper back in the bottle, but I forgot to screw it back on and spilled a bit, so just be careful with remembering to close it!
customer_reviews.author: Tasegna

customer_reviews.title: Rancid smell
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really like the rancid smell. I really think this oil is spoiled. I’ll change my rating when I see what the seller does for me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Frank

customer_reviews.title: TO EXPENSIVE FOR THE SIZE.
customer_reviews.text: YES, WAS VERY EXPENSIVE FOR THE SIZE, BUT DID MOISTURIZE OK. NOT GREAT. WILL NOT PURCHASE AGAIN, PRIMARILY BECAUSE OF TH COST AND HIGH SHIPPING PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: GDAN

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair
customer_reviews.text: Great for hair, not the best for my skin tho. I have fine hair. It is a pretty thick oil, so don't expect it to disappear like other hair oils might. I use this on wet hair and wear my hair up. For my fine hair, it is not a great option for styling. BUT it is very moisturizing and healing. So the day after use it in my hair, I will style like usual and my hair feels amazing. No odor from my. A little tiny tiny drop goes a LONG way with my hair. I image this would be a great product for thick, curly, or frizzy hair. I would recommend and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Suemo9

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful
customer_reviews.text: This does not smell like something I want to put on my skin or in my hair. Everything points to this being real Argan Oil. However the smell suggests what I received went bad before it was shipped to me. There is nothing on the bottle or included with the packaging to indicate a date produced or a expiration date. And of course I can’t return it. Based on the bottle I received, this isn’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is oil with no silicone so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE 100% argan oil products. It’s a great moisturizer for face and body. I love using it as a hair mask as well, but I t’s not like brand name argan oils that have fragrance, alcohol, dyes, and silicones, so it keeps its oily viscosity. It’s good for you head to toe and won’t leave build up like expensive brand names that’ll do more harm than good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Alderman

customer_reviews.title: I'd read that it absorbs immediately into the skin and is good for the ends of the hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm not certain what all the hype about Argan oil is about. Yes, Argan oil does resemble a serum in texture more than any other oil I have tried. I'd read that it absorbs immediately into the skin and is good for the ends of the hair. I haven't observed the first to be true, and the second is true, but the effect is not so supreme that I would purchase again at this price. You don't have to use a lot of it, but other oils can easily do the same at better prices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ingredient for skin health
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for skin care and an anti-aging ingredient. I massage into my clean, moist, warm face, neck and chest worn 24/7. I also add into my face/body creams/lotions. This is a natural/organic oil that penetrates deep into skin. Does not lay on the surface of skin. I am age 62 having smooth elastic skin.
customer_reviews.author: patricia h.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Dropper, Thin Argan Oil
customer_reviews.text: I had previously tried another brand of argan oil and bought this one by mistake when it ran out. I thought I'd just keep it since it was basically the same product. Not only did the argan oil seem much thinner/watery, but the dropper is horrible. When you pick it up out of the bottle, the oil drips almost in a stream from the dropper so that you don't even need to squeeze it and can't control the amount you use since the oil is too thin to stay in the dropper. I returned and bought my tried and true brand (Foxbrim) and am much happier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help control frizz. Unfortunately, it does not work well for me. Even with just two drops, my hair looks greasy and weighed down. The customer service I received was outstating. I simply replied to an email that I got from them telling them I was not happy with this product for frizz control, and I got a response with 5 minutes telling me to keep the product and they would issue me a refund. The refund was complete the next day. I'd say give this product a try, and hopefully it will work better for you. If not, the customer service is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi1780

customer_reviews.title: it literally smells like donkey manure
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my face and hair. Although it works well (which is why I give it 4 stars), it literally smells like donkey manure. I can handle a lot when it comes to "organic" smells, but this was pretty gnarly. I'm not sure if this is just what natural argan oil smells like because I usually buy Josie Maran. I fixed the smell by adding tea tree and lavender oils into the bottle. This really, really helped! It has made it much more bearable to use, plus no breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality oil
customer_reviews.text: Very rich oil. I add this to my face crème to really help with dry skin. I also add it to DIY hand soaps and face wash. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Peltier

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil but do feel the need to point out that it's not that potent. Definitely needed more than just 2 drops to get it going. Other than that, it does moisturize the hair well, and can be left in, so there's that. Doesn't smell, easily washed, convenient dropper. 9/10 recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: This Argan Oil is really a great product, give it a try - you'll be happy you tried it!
customer_reviews.text: Rec'd and used it last night for first time...Everything they told you about this product is true...Wonderful and in a minute is totally absorbed into your skin....Have a dry spot then hit it with this one and it all goes away....Aria Starr Beauty sent email with extra tips which I used and found helpful Too! Need a treatment for your skin? Here it is easy...peasy and problems of dryness settled...Love it! Wonderful price and pleasure to see fast results!
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: this product smells like bologna but I didn't expect to smell like raspberry ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to be honest, this product smells like bologna but I didn't expect to smell like raspberry Because it's natural, I buy a lot of natural products and they have all a weird smell anyway last night I had some of this oil on my face so my husband asked if I wear makeup or if I did something new 😀, I use on my hair also , I like and recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: BrooklynDiva55 gave it a try and loved it!
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars - "My first time trying Aria Starr Beauty Organic Argan Oil and I love it. I just now tried it on my face and lips. A very mild distinct wonderful smell to it. Glides on so smoothly, non-greasy, or shiny looking.. I like it. There's always a first time for everything and I am very happy I purchased this. Will recommend to family and friends. " This product is also soooooooo versatile. Can be used for many things - its great! I am always happy when a product says what it does and does what it said. That speaks trust. A happy customer is a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Grant

customer_reviews.title: In love with Argan Oil
customer_reviews.text: Argan oil is AMAZING! So I developed psoriasis in my pregnancy, real dry itchy scalp...flash forward to daughter's birth, suddenly don't have time to do a coconut oil treatment three times a week. Any new mom knows how difficult it can be to find time to shower as often as they would like, which is where this stuff comes in. I put a few drops on my hands, emulsify, and rub on my scalp and like magic wake up the next day with a moisturized scalp, no flakes and soft shiny hair! Doesn't leave it greasy either!! The oil doesn't have much of a scent, I absolutely rely on this stuff as a new momma!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Argan Oil. This is my second time purchasing it. I use it for my face as a moisturizer. I have very oily skin and this doesn't leave me with a greasy shiny face. I also have used this oil in my hair and my homemade shea butter mixtures. The seller is great and is concern if everything is going well with the product. No complaints whatsoever. I will not buy any other brand but this one.
customer_reviews.author: penut

customer_reviews.title: It’s replaced all my other moisturizers
customer_reviews.text: Has replaced most of my other moisturizers. My husband and son also use this because of very sensitive skin. I use it on my eyes and face, feet and elbows. It has kept all my dry skin away. I don’t think I will ever use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: A. Veauthier

customer_reviews.title: best argan oil, dont buy the others.
customer_reviews.text: best argan oil, dont buy the others. this one easily absorbs into your skin. it doesn't have a weird smell. it didn't cause me to breakout when i applied it to my face like pura d'or. it left my hair shiny and not greasy looking. it is especially great for split ends. i apply some after i shower and in the morning my hair looks healthy and not dry. I live in las vegas and this saved my skin and hair from the heat and dry climate
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Ease of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this oil for my cuticles, and it is working to soften them up. Nice oil, no odor.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Larry

customer_reviews.title: Softens tough skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin. I was looking for a product that I could use particularly on my elbows and knees. Even though this is an oil, it’s not too greasy/oily. I’ve tried several things that friends recommend. Found Argan is the best for me
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: but just a few drops is good. I like how it works on my special ...
customer_reviews.text: "Well I think it is doing well with my hair, though a very little bit is needed. My hair is long, half way down my back, but just a few drops is good. I like how it works on my special needs son beard. He is tolerating me rubbing it on so obviously the smell (which I can barely sense) is not an issue for him. It helps to make his beard smooth, and keeps the skin under it soft and blemish free, though he doesn't normally have that problem I noticed one went away in less then 48 hours, which is really important since he tends to pick on things."
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ellen E. Markle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite oil so far!
customer_reviews.text: Great oil. I've tried multiple and I'm very happy with this one! I use it on my face at night and morning and I immediately felt improvement in my skin. Less dry and dull. I didn't read the description closely enough and was surprised at how small the bottle is. But the product itself is great! I'll be reordering soon!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Happy with that because that is one of the biggest ...
customer_reviews.text: I got sometimes oily sometimes dry skin depending on weather. Oil does not make my face look greasy and doesn't take long to absorb. Happy with that because that is one of the biggest turn off I have with anything that goes on my face. I have pesky whitheads that seem like they don't want to go away but this argan oil is not make them worse. Wouldn't say better but definitely no breaking out and such. Little goes a very long way about three drop to the face and same to problem spot I have else where . Gonna buy again great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: excellent!

customer_reviews.title: Hidden gem.
customer_reviews.text: This, honest to goodness, solved my acne and acne scars. Though, yes, my acne scars havent completely disappeared yet but they have undeniably lessened both in color and size. Ever since I started using this, I also have stopped developing new acne especially cystic ones. I mean come on, this has been a hidden gem for me and I sincerely thank God for the discovery of this product because I have tried numerous products to no avail. Who knew that something labeled 'oil' and acne would cross out each other? Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: The Cloud-Rider

customer_reviews.title: Not for Bleach Blonde/White hair
customer_reviews.text: If you do not have bleach blonde hair, this product should work for you and you may ignore this review. However, I have bleach blonde/white dyed hair and this oil turned my hair yellow. I use purple shampoo & conditioner which keep my hair white but after using this oil my hair looked yellow. Another wash later, my hair went back to white.
customer_reviews.author: AlexandraEECU

customer_reviews.title: While the feel of the oil is very nice and I love that it's organic
customer_reviews.text: While the feel of the oil is very nice and I love that it's organic, I've been using it for about 6 weeks now and I don't see any difference in my skin. It is a very nice oil, and leaves my skin feeling nice. I was just hoping to see some improvement in skin tone and overall appearance. I'm 62 and while everyone tells me I look at least 10 yrs. younger than I am, I do have some wrinkles and loose skin. Wasn't looking for a miracle, just some firming. I'm disappointed, but thanks for making a nice, organic product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This oily is amazing, I bought it for a new tattoo I got . The tattoo is now Healing but I can tell a difference in the color of the tattoo from not using it on a previous tat. I also used it on my beard and my face. It's quit amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Daetron L

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil for the price.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am happy with this oil. I have been using it for about a month. It works well with my other skin oils. Does not have an unpleasant scent. I do wish it’s texture was a bit thicker but for the price I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Five Star Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this product and the customer service I received as well. I use it on my face under my make up and my skin feels as good in the evening as it does in the morning. I also use it on my nails and cuticles. The product arrived on SUNDAY, un heard of... and Aria sent me an e-mail thanking me for my order and giving me ideas and tips on using the oil. Will I buy this product again?? YES Will I buy it from Aria? ABSOLUTELY.
customer_reviews.author: Maudesmum

customer_reviews.title: Will be a persistent customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this oil because my sister told me that i needed argan oil for my dry hair. I read a bunch of reviews before i ordered THIS specific one. And i must say i am SO GLAD that i did! I have very dry, damaged hair and I’ve gone months without blowing out my hair / straitening it (i usually prefer it curly) and with the help of this oil along with jojoba oil i was able to do so! Don’t get me wrong, i still have to cut my ends and keep it maintained BUT with the help of this argan oil I’m sure my hair will be healthier than ever before and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Yeni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hair now
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My 7 year old daughter had very dry and dull hair since she has been taking swimming lessons every day, going to the beach, etc. I decided to pick this Argan Oil to see if it helps. Her hair looks so good and shiny but not oily at all. I am so glad we have this and I recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Swan

customer_reviews.title: Great for mending cuticles, hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Virgin Argan Oil for a week now, and it has cured the raggedy cuticles I always have from doing yard work. I can see an improvement in my nails already. It also helps keep my fingertips from getting rough and just the small excess from doing my nails works as an excellent hand lotion. I use it for this purpose three times a day. The Argan Oil has also taken care of the rough ends on my hair. The hair care products I had been using dropped their price - and dropped argan oil from their ingredients. A friend convinced me that 100% argan oil would do a much better job, and she was right.
customer_reviews.author: Anne V WIlliams

customer_reviews.title: Love this, my skin is so soft.
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil, I've been putting it on my full face and neck at night time and my face has been soft and CLEAN! I have some pores on my face, I'm hoping it'll help clear them up to! I'm definitely gona keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: masreth

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for hair, but not for face
customer_reviews.text: I've been using argan oil as a facial moisturizer for over a year. My skin is very dry and even the heaviest lotions weren't helping. I tried olive oil and coconut oil, but both left my skin greasy. In contrast, argan oil absorbs quickly and leaves a soft, dewy finish. I previously used, but wondered if this organic oil would be even better for my skin. Unfortunately, I had some breakouts the first two weeks of using this and overall my skin looks rather dull. I might use the rest of this bottle as a hair moisturizer while I look for something more effective for my face.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Comes wonderfully packaged. The first time I used it, i applied it like I do with my Vitamin C serum (5-6 drops), DO NOT DO THAT! My face was pretty oily after that (although it was SO moisturized). After contacting them, they told me to only use one or two drops. I have been doing that and my oil problem was fixed! Very earthy smell but not overwhelming. I also put it in my hair (again only a few drops) and it is so soft after that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: lastly its not as good as the other argan oil i have tried
customer_reviews.text: when comparing this product i give it a 1. The bottle is smaller than shown when purchased. next , it does not have a smell. lastly its not as good as the other argan oil i have tried. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Essen 33

customer_reviews.title: Use it every night as my face lotion. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it every night as my face lotion. I used coconut oil before, which always left me greasy even until the morning. This Argan oil soaks in immediately for a smooth, matte feel. I also used in my hair. A drop or two is sufficient! I have dryish thickish long hair. This bottle is small...but the dropper allows one to control the amount. Just a few drops is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This is the best smelling Argan Oil that I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smelling Argan Oil that I've ever purchased, it smells so good, it's the best of the best. I've tried several others but this is the one I really like, I wish they still offered it in the 4 oz bottle and not just the 1 oz, too bad.
customer_reviews.author: GarySten

customer_reviews.title: Great for mild eczema/dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil so far. I have mild eczema and my face tends to get severe dry patches (especially during winter) and I find that normal lotion does not seem to be enough. I put a light layer of this on my face and rub it in every other night and it has really cleared up alot of the dry patches on my face. I also put this into my scalp and rub into my hair from time to time--combined with Jamaican black castor oil, almond oil, evening primrose oil, olive oil and coconut oil. It all hydrates and keeps the eczema-related itchiness at bay. Will definitely purchase again when I run out. Barely any smell.
customer_reviews.author: bluzerz

customer_reviews.title: The oil is wonderful and tones down strong essential oils beautifully
customer_reviews.text: The oil is wonderful and tones down strong essential oils beautifully. When used for skin application, it is very easy to apply and one does not need to use too much to reap the benefits of Argan oil. I love it and also learned that it can be used on my face and neck mixed with essential oils beneficial for skin care. I have used Aria Starr's Argan Oil for over one year now and I love it! There are several different ways to use the oil and I like to use it on my hair and face. I mix Argan Oil with other essential oils for maximum benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Earthnerd

customer_reviews.title: Just a very satisfied user of this product
customer_reviews.text: After using my first bottle of this, I will not be without it. My nephew has psoriasis all over his body. After about eight days of Argon oil use, it was gone!! For myself, I have very dry skin. Using just a few drops of this all over my body, my skin is so soft now. If I could give it ten stars I would. I'm not a paid person writing this either. Just a very satisfied user of this product. Hope this helps someone decide. Debbie
customer_reviews.author: Debbsters

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and smooth oil
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my face when the weather is cold and dry and it protects my skin very well. I like this oil although I am a new user the reason I did not give it 5 stars is that it is a pricey oil in my opinion. There are other organic Argan oils that are less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Good for Face and Hair !
customer_reviews.text: I really like this oil. I ordered it for my skin, and I do like it on my face and neck. It feels smooth without being oily. I read the information about it, and it was suggested to use it on the hair to protect against the damages that blow drying can cause. It works great for hair also. I am about 60 percent gray, by my natural color, and the texture of the gray hair is very dry. With the argon oil it feels and looks like the rest of my hair without being oily. Warning, only use a little on the ends, or it can be really oily! This one little jar will go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Winddancer

customer_reviews.title: I PUT THIS IN A SMALLER BOTTLE SO I COULD USE IT ON MY LIPS,,,LOVE LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS GREAT FOR LIPS ALSO NAIL AREA....ETC LOVE IT PUT IT IN SMALLER BOTTLE I CAN CARRY IT IN MY PURSE FOR MY LIPS,,LOVE IT..MUST BUT I AM VERY PICKY.. WILL TELL OTHER FRIENDS..
customer_reviews.author: Candy Overby

customer_reviews.title: When my hair was straight I applied to damp hair (without all the scrunching) it was so super silky shiny my pony tail would sli
customer_reviews.text: When applied to damp hair this product brings my permed curls to life, keeps the friz down and hair is so soft while still remaining vuluminous and shiny- not oily. I've tried other argan oil products without nearly the desired results as this. I get compliments almost everyday on the big curls. To apply: after washing, towel dry and scrunch into hair; about 10 drops, then let hair air dry. When my hair was straight I applied to damp hair (without all the scrunching) it was so super silky shiny my pony tail would slip out if it wasn't very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jushi

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased Aria Argan Oil at a festival. I used it for my hands and hair then moved on because I tend to try new products often. Only recently did I continue using it but this time on my face. I love the product. My skin is smoother and it is not oily. It has no scent and absorbs very well. You can use it on hands, feet, hair and face. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NAP

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Just started to use this product, was using another brand that was more expensive so my opinion is just in the beginning stages. Be sure to use a drop or two to find out how well it absorbs into your skin. I was using a lighter formular of argan oil. We will see in a couple of weeks what works better for me. So far, it's all good. Delivery was fast and that pleased me. The price is a good bargain for the size bottle I received. Stay tuned. Thanks AriaStarrBeauty!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am relatively new to using oil instead of regular moisturizer but I have to say that I love it! Im almost 30 and have struggled with acne since my teens. I'm going to give it a good amount of time to see how it helps with that but my skin feels soft and smooth so it's a good start. I've been using it in my hair as well and it's definitely helping my long curly hair be soft and de frizzed. I read that some people dislike the smell of argon oil but it doesn't bother me at all. I'd rather something pure like this product then somethig with added fragrances.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Followup from your email
customer_reviews.text: Only used the product one time as a scalp/hair conditioner. Loved the shine that it gave to my hair and now trying it on my complexion. Glad that I ordered the product and will continue to use as you advised me. Thanks for your info on where and how to use....this is definitely a positive for your company and this product. It appears that you care about your customers and that is appreciated! Thanks again. BL
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Lorance

customer_reviews.title: Does moisturize somewhat without a greasy after effect. Other ...
customer_reviews.text: Does moisturize somewhat without a greasy after effect. Other than that, I don’t notice any major improvements. However, I will give it more time to give results and update accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: More than pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Rosales on my cheeks for years, putting up with the seasonal blemishes as the weather changes. I started to use your argon oil at night, as a last resort. Amazingly, in a very short time, my rosacea areas are clear! I've had no blemishes for months, now, regardless of any weather changes. I'm beyond satisfied with your product! Thanks to your argon oil, my complexion remains not only clear, but soft and healthy in feel and appearance!
customer_reviews.author: Jg

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This oil is very versatile. I use it on my neck and chest, hands and occasionally on my scalp...pretty much wherever my skin is dry. A little goes a long way, and it smells good but not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley S

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oil I ever purchased to put on my skin. I have been putting on my face, neck and hands. My hands looks much moistured and skin looks younger.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product - Best I’ve Tried
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. It is pure, clean, 100% odorless & absorbs quickly. I use it on my face, under my eyes, hands, feet & hair. I have tried the expensive Argan products on the market sold in high end department stores & tv shopping channels - they don’t come close to this. I love the way this product feels on my skin & how quickly it absorbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lkaik

customer_reviews.title: Best in the southwest
customer_reviews.text: I live in Albuquerque and it has been a cold dry windy spring. My skin was freaking out - flaky yet oily with pimples - and I needed a great moisturizer. I've been using the argan oil on my face and hair after my morning shower and washing and moisturizing after work. My skin has calmed way down and my hair is soft and shiny. I've been telling all my friends about it. It is lighter and absorbs better than other oils I've used (boots facial oil and coconut oil).👍
customer_reviews.author: Kandahar

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and is absolutely non greasy when applied on face
customer_reviews.text: Well I have only started using it only a couple of days ago. It smells great and is absolutely non greasy when applied on face.. I sometimes wonder if i am applying the right amount :) Have stopped applying creams / moisturizers after starting to use this. Lets see how it works with repeated usage.
customer_reviews.author: Dhanashri

customer_reviews.title: Love what it does, hate how it smells
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil and what it does for my hair. It is so shiny and healthy looking. my only problem is the smell. It smells like poop. I have no other way to describe it. Maybe I got a bad batch. I can't use it anymore due to the smell and I hate that. I'm looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Aria Starr Organic Argan Oil approximately 2 weeks ago, and one word which describes it is WOW. I'm very happy with my purchase. I've used it in my hair, after washing as a conditioner, and it has made my hair very soft and manageable (I'm African American, and this is a must have - Believe me it works and it's ORGANIC). I also used it on my face, and the feel, the softness, it's wonderful. I put on nightly on my nails/cuticles, and I can honestly say, that after one use of using this, I saw an improvement wherever I've used it. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you. I'm excited to try your other products.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great for beard oil
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil as a beard oil after researching ingredients in much more expensive specifically marketed as "Beard Oils". I mix with proportional quantities of jojoba and grape seed oil and as a combination I could not be happier! This Argan oil from Aria is pure, light, basically non-fragrant and came well packaged. I could not be more satisfied with my purchase. The shipment came fast and secure and the follow-up from Aria was an added bonus. It is refreshing to see a manufacturer that shows interest in the buyer after the sale.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great oil for dry facial skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice good product. It is super simple to use and I like that the bottle is dark to keep the product active. A little goes a long way! I've used this on my face at night with no break outs and it leaves my skin very hydrated in the morning. I use retin A so my skin can get very dry and flatly and this helps more than my expensive night creams. i have also used it mixed into a hair mask. I will defiantly be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Youstina

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter as a gift. she loves it. She has always had to use some type of moisture and says this leaves no greasy feeling and you use a very small amount for the area I got this product for my self in Sept.2015 because my daughter like it. i am very happy with this. Was not thinking about my hands and nails but they have really improved just by applying to other parts of my body. i have a medicat issue with dry skin, this really helped
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: Simply great
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to argan oil. I've been using it for about a week now and am glad I bought it. I like how versatile it is. I use it for my eczema and my keratosis. It's not a cure for either, but is extremely helpful. More so than anything else I've tried in 30-some years. I also appreciate how the seller contacted me to make sure I'm satisfied with the product. My answer is yes, I'm very satisfied with the product and the seller. Great product, great service, one very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: My hair and skin feel wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this oil. I bought it to add to my leave-in conditioner and it works great to moisturize my hair and it helps get rid of frizzies. I started adding it to my lotion too and my skin is soft and smooth! It only takes a couple drops for silky smooth skin and hair. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Muncy

customer_reviews.title: Good oil with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Argan oil has being used since ancient times. I love how fast and quick the oil goes on my face. Since I dont have a lot of time in the morning to get ready, this baby helps my skin immensely. Winter is making my skin massively dried and with the oil and my sun protection lotion equal happy face without having breakouts. Argan oil so suitable for all skin types. It does not clog the pores. Those are highly sensitive and tend to have acne prone skin like myself. I Promise that this oil would not break you out.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for a "clean" replacement for my Morrocanoil brand product, which I recently discovered contains red dye. Tried this as a substitute. Found it to be too thin, and made my hair appear a little oily. I'll have to return this one and try something else. I want something that has a thicker consistency, like my current product. Suggestions anyone??
customer_reviews.author: Lora Vorkink

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: My fashionable teenage niece recommended Moroccan Oil to make my hair shiny and look better. I went for this instead. It does make my hair look healthier and more bouncy. Not quite as slick and shiny as I was thinking but it's great. I have mid-neck length fine hair and one drop (without putting pressure on the dropper) is plenty. I rub it in wet hair before combing it out and blow drying. I expect the bottle will last about a year. It has zero scent, which is a huge bonus for me. This particular bottle is nice because of the dropper. I expect I'd have trouble pouring such a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - like the results!
customer_reviews.text: I think this Argan Oil is a quality product, and really like how it's working. I've been using it on my face, hands & neck and very pleased with results - it does help moisturize without greasy feel since it absorbs into the skin quickly. I'm going to stick with it to see if it helps the texture of my skin improve - my skin tends to get congested. Also, I like the glow it gives my skin without looking greasy - makeup applies very smoothly over it.
customer_reviews.author: GR MI

product_meta.title: Aria Starr Beauty Organic Argan Oil For Hair, Skin, Face, Nails, Beard & Cuticles - Best 100% Pure Moroccan Anti Aging, Anti Wrinkle Beauty Secret, Cold Pressed Moisturizer 1oz
feature_bullets: #1 HIGHEST QUALITY Virgin Argan Oil 100% Pure Certified Organic. Moroccan Ancient Beauty Secret Produced Organically. Delivered To You in a Dark Glass Bottle to Limit Exposure to Light for Ultimate Preservation. Many natural healing properties for Anti-Aging, Anti-Frizz, Anti-Oxidant-Rich & Anti-Inflammatory

Results Often Come Fast. Usually Customers Report Soft Skin and Shiny Silky Hair Immediately. In Many Instances, A Long-Lasting Radiant Natural Healthy Glow to Their Previous Dry Skin and Damaged Frizzy Hair

The Perfect Moisturizer Even For Easily Irritated and Sensitive Skin. Non-Greasy Fragrance-Free and Absorbs Quickly to Relieve Chapped Flaky Itchy Skin Without Buring or Stinging. Be Amazed at the Soft Touch of Your Smooth Skin and Face in Addition to an Even Skin Tone

The natural scent of our 100% pure organic argan oil has a raw, earthy aroma. The scent always disappears after a few minutes on your skin, as true Argan Oil absorbs very quickly and beautifully. Please read more about our scent in our "Product Description" below.

Discover the "Liquid Gold" that Salons Across the Nation are Raving About. When You Order Now, Know that You're Protected By Our ONE YEAR ★ No Questions Asked Money Back Satisfaction Guarantee - Even If You Return the Bottle Empty. Your Satisfaction Is Our #1 Priority
